<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Limited">[Silver's Refrain](/Spells.aspx?ID=555)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 74</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

The “Song of Silver” was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song’s benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

 Weapon and unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) cast by a [devil](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using _dimension door_. If a devil attempts to enter the area using _dimension door_ and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.
name: Silver's Refrain
